payment_terms.description: The payment terms for the contract.

enumDescriptions.yearly: Payment is due once a year.
enumDescriptions.one-time: Payment is made in a single transaction.

warranty.description: The warranty period for the contract.

enumDescriptions.standard: Standard warranty is provided for 1 year.
enumDescriptions.non_standard: Non-standard warranty is provided other than 1 year.

customer_name.description: The name of the customer for the contract.
